attributes.additional_details: Not only this but there are many people over 18 who do not have a interest in voting but there are people under 18 who really to want to vote, but can't and this is unfair! I am calling for the government to lower the voting age to 16 and urge you to share this petition if you agree. Thank you.
attributes.background: Currently the minimum voting age is 18, howvever I feel that this should be lowered. As a 15 year old who is involved heavily with politics I feel that a vote at 16 years old would help to prepare people for using a vote wisely.
